dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: A smartphone market emerging from the shadows, that's the picture Damir Seissembekov from the Ministry of Digital Development is painting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A smartphone market emerging from the shadows, that's the picture Damir Seissembekov from the Ministry of Digital Development is painting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's all because of this new device verification system, right? With the white, gray, and black lists for phones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's all because of this new device verification system, right? With the white, gray, and black lists for phones.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As of March 24, Kazakhstan introduced white, gray, and black lists for registering cellular devices.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He's saying that, uh, legal sellers are now competing more fairly, so prices in official stores might actually drop instead of rise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. He's saying that, uh, legal sellers are now competing more fairly, so prices in official stores might actually drop instead of rise.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Because of this initiative, smartphone prices in official stores will not rise ' in fact, they may even drop. The market is being legalized, and as a result, official distributors will now compete with other legitimate importers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is pretty counterintuitive, you know? Usually new regulations mean higher costs, but here it's the opposite.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is pretty counterintuitive, you know? Usually new regulations mean higher costs, but here it's the opposite.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! And he mentioned that big distributors used to spend a ton of money fighting the gray market—now those funds can go into promotions and better pricing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! And he mentioned that big distributors used to spend a ton of money fighting the gray market-now those funds can go into promotions and better pricing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Seissembekov added that major distributors previously spent large sums on marketing and fighting the gray market. Now, those funds can be redirected to benefit consumers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: So it's like cutting their losses from battling illegal imports and redirecting that energy toward consumers. Smart.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's like cutting their losses from battling illegal imports and redirecting that energy toward consumers. Smart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: And he even thinks this could attract, um, international companies to open official offices in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he even thinks this could attract, um, international companies to open official offices in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As major manufacturers observe these changes, it could lead to the opening of official representative offices of international companies in Kazakhstan,' he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: That's a big deal—global brands entering the market signals real trust in the system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a big deal-global brands entering the market signals real trust in the system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they extended the free verification deadline for individuals till June 25th, which gives people more time to get compliant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they extended the free verification deadline for individuals till June twenty fifth, which gives people more time to get compliant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, authorities extended the deadline for free smartphone verification for individuals until June 25.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: And after that, buyers can return unverified phones even past the usual two-week window. That's consumer-friendly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And after that, buyers can return unverified phones even past the usual two-week window. That's consumer-friendly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After that date, buyers will be able to return unverified smartphones to the seller, even if more than two weeks have passed since the purchase.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like a push for total market transparency—from the manufacturer all the way to the buyer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like a push for total market transparency-from the manufacturer all the way to the buyer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. If it works, it could be a model for other regions dealing with gray market issues.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. If it works, it could be a model for other regions dealing with gray market issues.
